程序包 org.apache.giraph.graph

Package of all the graph related objects, built on the org.apache.bsp package.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    GraphStateAware<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Interface specifying that the class can be configured with a GraphState.
    VertexChanges<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Structure to hold all the possible graph mutations that can occur during a superstep.
    VertexResolver<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Handles all the situations that can arise upon creation/removal of vertices and edges.
    VertexValueFactory<V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Factory class to create default vertex values.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AddressesAndPartitionsWritable
    Helper class to write descriptions of master, workers and partition owners
    ComputeCallable<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Compute as many vertex partitions as possible.
    DefaultVertexResolver<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Default implementation of how to resolve vertex creation/removal, messages to nonexistent vertices, etc.
    DefaultVertexValueFactory<V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Default VertexValueFactory that simply uses the default constructor for the vertex value class.
    FinishedSuperstepStats
    Immutable graph stats after the completion of a superstep
    GiraphTransferRegulator
    Utility class to manage data transfers from a local worker reading InputSplits.
    GlobalStats
    Aggregated stats by the master.
    GraphMapper<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    This mapper that will execute the BSP graph tasks alloted to this worker.
    GraphState<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Immutable global state of the graph.
    GraphTaskManager<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    The Giraph-specific business logic for a single BSP compute node in whatever underlying type of cluster our Giraph job will run on.
    InputSplitEvents
    Simple container of input split events.
    InputSplitPaths
    Simple container of input split paths for coordination via ZooKeeper.
    TaskInfo
    Abstract class for information about any task - worker or master.
    Vertex<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Basic abstract class for writing a BSP application for computation.
    VertexEdgeCount
    Simple immutable structure for storing a final vertex and edge count.
    VertexMutations<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Structure to hold all the possible graph mutations that can occur during a superstep.
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    GraphFunctions
    Each compute node running on the underlying cluster is marked with this enum to indicate the worker or master task(s) it must perform during job runs.
